description: Maximal number of unit circles through n points in plane, each circle containing 3 of the points.
references: P. Erdős and G. Purdy, Extremal problems in combinatorial geometry, Chapter 17 in Handbook of Combinatorics, North-Holland '95, p. 848.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
extensions: The article by Erdős and Purdy incorrectly says (on p. 847) that each circle must contain a pair of the points.
